Package control

Class AsyncMerger

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • control.AsyncMerger

  • class AsyncMerger
extends java.lang.Thread
    This inner class is responsible for all the actions that have to happen in a separate thread during merge It is also responsible for altering the ResultsWindow object, updating the progress bar and the text next to it
    Author:
    TsimpDim

    • Constructor Detail

      • AsyncMerger

        public AsyncMerger​(java.util.ArrayList<PdfFile> allFiles,
                   boolean targetFileExists,
                   ResultsWindow progBar,
                   java.lang.String destination,
                   java.io.File testFile,
                   com.itextpdf.kernel.utils.PdfMerger merger,
                   com.itextpdf.kernel.pdf.PdfDocument pdf)
        Constructs an AsyncMerger object
        Parameters:
        allFiles - An ArrayList containing all the files
        targetFileExists - Flag about whether the file we are trying to save to already exists (and needs to be overwritten) or not
        progBar - The ResultsWindow object we want to show.
        destination - The full path of the merged file save location
        testFile - The File we use to test whether or not the file we are saving to already exists or not
        merger - The PdfMerger we want to use
        pdf - The final PdfDocument.
